short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unbiasify hides names and profile photos on social networks so you can focus on what actually matters when recruiting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unbiasify is an open source chrome extension that allows you to source candidates from LinkedIn and Lever without seeing people's names or faces. We're working towards expanding these features to other popular websites.
